lead_paragraph: GRUENGLAS--Abe. Abe Gruenglas, beloved father, husband, son, and brother, passed away in New York City on May 30, 2016 of natural causes at the age of 89. Abe, a survivor of the Holocaust, was educated as a civil engineer at Brooklyn College and served his career in the NYC Department of Finance, retiring from his post as Assistant Surveyor for the Borough of Brooklyn. Abe is survived by his wife Magda, and his sons Michael, Benjamin and Jeffrey. Abe was laid to rest in a family plot at Mt. Lebanon cemetery in Queens, NY. He will be greatly missed. Memorial donations may be made in Abe's name at www.queenshatzolah.org. 1/3
